name: Silencing Strike
content:
Description

Like an expert assassin or ninja, you can render your foes completely unable to alert others of your presence. This might take the form of a dart to the larynx, a garrote around the throat, or simply a sturdy covering of the mouth.

Effect

Whenever you deal damage using a weapon with the precise property to a target that is caught off guard or otherwise unaware of the attack, such as when you are hidden from them, disguised as a friend, or have successfully deceived them, the target is afflicted with the silenced bane.
